title: My font or 3dsmax?
content: I have created a typeface in .otf PS format and want to use it in 3dsmax program, but I can't find my typeface. There is no problem in another program, just in 3dsmax. Why? Thanks a lot :)
author: nuk

comments.content: I've checked other font, .otf also, there's no problem at all. So, I think the problem is at my font. Can anybody explain this? Thanks :)

did you try to export your typeface in another format and try again?

dr
Either export your face as a TrueType or if its not a longer text you can always import Illustrator outlines into 3dsMax. For that you need to save your outlines as legacy format Illustrator 3.
